title: Chad Le Clos looks back on his shock win against Michael Phelps from London 2012
description: The man who caused one of the biggest Olympic upsets of all-time: Chad Le Clos. The South African looks back on his famous victory in the 200m butterfly against swimming legend Michael Phelps at London 2012. Chad is joined by team-mate Calvyn Justus and sports broadcaster Cindy Poluta. Plus, a little a cameo from Chad's dad Bert. This is the final episode of three 'Time Machine' pods hosted by Nick McCarvel.
